sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './EventDetails.css'; const EventDetails = () => { const schedule = [ { time: '17:00', event: 'Ceremonia Religiosa', location: 'Iglesia Santa Baia de Mondariz', icon: '⛪' }, { time: '18:00', event: 'Cóctel de Bienvenida', location: 'Hotel Balneario Mondariz', icon: '🥂' }, { time: '20:00', event: 'Banquete Nupcial', location: 'Salón principal', icon: '🍽️' }, { time: '22:30', event: 'Primer Baile', location: 'Pista de baile', icon: '💃' }, { time: '23:00', event: 'Fiesta y Baile', location: 'Salón privado del hotel', icon: '🎉' }, { time: '03:00', event: 'After Party', location: 'Sala privada del hotel', icon: '�' } ]; return (
